title: Physics teacher
skillsAndExperience:
- Passion for learning and teaching and be committed to raising standards 
- Up to date with current pedagogical thinking 
- Able to inspire others to ensure the delivery of high-quality learning experiences for our students 
- Fantastic subject knowledge and understand how to teach highly challenging lessons so that students can reach the top grades in the subject. 
- High expectations of themselves and others Ambitious and committed to ongoing professional development
whatSchoolOffers:
- A bespoke curriculum offering students a strong core entitlement in English, Mathematics and Science 
- A full extra-curricular programme with opportunities for enrichment activities for all 
- An excellent opportunity for continued personal development through our Talent Pathway 
- A wide range of staff benefits 
- Excellent resources and facilities 
- A wonderful community that is involved within school life.

title: Teacher KS1 or KS2
skillsAndExperience:
- Passion for learning and teaching and be committed to raising standards 
- Up to date with current pedagogical thinking 
- Able to inspire others to ensure the delivery of high-quality learning experiences for our students 
- Fantastic subject knowledge and understand how to teach highly challenging lessons so that students can reach the top grades in the subject. 
- High expectations of themselves and others Ambitious and committed to ongoing professional development
whatSchoolOffers:
- A bespoke curriculum offering students a strong core entitlement in English, Mathematics and Science 
- A full extra-curricular programme with opportunities for enrichment activities for all 
- An excellent opportunity for continued personal development through our Talent Pathway 
- A wide range of staff benefits 
- Excellent resources and facilities 
- A wonderful community that is involved within school life.
safeguardingCommitment: This school is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people and for ensuring that they are protected from harm.
furtherDetailsAboutTheRole: The candidate will be required to undergo a full enhanced DBS check and must be eligible to work in the UK.

title: Teacher
schoolType: Local authority maintained school, ages 3 to 5
skillsAndExperience:
- Passion for learning and teaching and be committed to raising standards 
- Up to date with current pedagogical thinking 
- Able to inspire others to ensure the delivery of high-quality learning experiences for our students 
- Fantastic subject knowledge and understand how to teach highly challenging lessons so that students can reach the top grades in the subject. 
- High expectations of themselves and others Ambitious and committed to ongoing professional development
whatSchoolOffers:
- A bespoke curriculum offering students a strong core entitlement in English, Mathematics and Science 
- A full extra-curricular programme with opportunities for enrichment activities for all 
- An excellent opportunity for continued personal development through our Talent Pathway 
- A wide range of staff benefits 
- Excellent resources and facilities 
- A wonderful community that is involved within school life.
safeguardingCommitment: This school is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people and for ensuring that they are protected from harm.
furtherDetailsAboutTheRole: The candidate will be required to undergo a full enhanced DBS check and must be eligible to work in the UK.

title: Chef
skillsAndExperience: We are looking for a school chef with a strong background in culinary arts, capable of creating a diverse and nutritious menu for our students. The ideal candidate should have knowledge of various cooking techniques, be skilled in preparing both vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes, and have an understanding of children's nutritional needs. Familiarity with dietary requirements, including allergies and specific preferences like vegan or gluten-free options, is essential.
whatSchoolOffers:
- A full extra-curricular programme with opportunities for enrichment activities for all 
- An excellent opportunity for continued personal development through our Talent Pathway 
- A wide range of staff benefits 
- Excellent resources and facilities 
- A wonderful community that is involved within school life.
safeguardingCommitment: This school is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people and for ensuring that they are protected from harm.
furtherDetailsAboutTheRole: The candidate will be required to undergo a full enhanced DBS check and must be eligible to work in the UK.

organisation.name: Greenwood Academy
organisation.about: Innovative and forward-thinking, Greenwood Academy offers a dynamic approach to education. Our commitment to integrating technology into our curriculum requires an IT Technician who is passionate about digital solutions.
organisation.safeguardingCommitment: Committed to student safety, our staff are vigilant and proactive in ensuring a secure and nurturing environment for all.

title: IT Technician
skillsAndExperience: Seeking an IT Technician with a strong background in computer systems and network management. The ideal candidate should have experience in troubleshooting hardware and software issues, managing school IT infrastructure, and providing technical support to staff and students.
whatSchoolOffers:
- Continuous professional development opportunities
- Access to the latest technology and resources
- A supportive and collaborative team environment.
safeguardingCommitment: Our school is dedicated to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children, ensuring a safe and inclusive environment.
furtherDetailsAboutTheRole: Applicants must pass a DBS check and have the right to work in the UK. Prior experience in educational settings is a plus.

organisation.name: Riverside Secondary
organisation.about: Riverside Secondary is a vibrant educational institution with a focus on scientific discovery and innovation. We are looking for a Science Technician to support our science department, helping to inspire the next generation of scientists.
organisation.safeguardingCommitment: We prioritize the safety and well-being of our students, fostering a secure and supportive learning atmosphere.

title: Science Technician
skillsAndExperience: Looking for a dedicated Science Technician with experience in setting up laboratory experiments, managing equipment, and adhering to safety protocols. Familiarity with the science curriculum and ability to assist in practical lessons is crucial.
whatSchoolOffers:
- A dynamic and innovative work environment
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- A strong community spirit.
safeguardingCommitment: Our commitment to safeguarding extends to ensuring a safe and positive environment for our students and staff.
furtherDetailsAboutTheRole: The candidate should have relevant qualifications in science or a related field. A DBS check is required.

organisation.name: Maple Grove Primary
organisation.about: Maple Grove Primary is a community-centric school that values the safety and well-being of our students and staff. We are seeking a Site Manager to oversee the maintenance and security of our school facilities.
organisation.safeguardingCommitment: Dedicated to creating a safe and welcoming environment for our young learners.

title: Site Manager
skillsAndExperience: The ideal candidate will have experience in facility management, basic repair skills, and knowledge of health and safety protocols. Strong organizational skills and the ability to work independently are essential.
whatSchoolOffers:
- A supportive and collaborative working environment
- Opportunities for professional development
- A role that is integral to the school community.
safeguardingCommitment: Our school is committed to the safety and welfare of its students and staff, and expects all staff to share this commitment.
furtherDetailsAboutTheRole: Successful candidates will be subject to an enhanced DBS check. Previous experience in a school setting is advantageous.

organisation.name: Hilltop High School
organisation.about: At Hilltop High School, we pride ourselves on providing a safe and positive lunchtime experience for our students. We are seeking a Midday Supervisor who is caring, vigilant, and enjoys working with children.
organisation.safeguardingCommitment: Ensuring a secure and supportive environment during all school hours, including lunchtimes.

title: Midday/Lunchtime Supervisor
skillsAndExperience: Looking for an individual with patience, good communication skills, and a positive attitude towards child development. Previous experience in a school setting is preferred but not essential.
whatSchoolOffers:
- A rewarding role with direct impact on student well-being
- Training and development opportunities
- A friendly and supportive staff team.
safeguardingCommitment: We are dedicated to the protection and well-being of our students, with a strong emphasis on safeguarding during all school activities.
furtherDetailsAboutTheRole: Candidates will need to complete a DBS check. Experience working with children is beneficial.

organisation.name: Valley View Elementary
organisation.about: Valley View Elementary is a nurturing and innovative school, looking for an Administrator to join our team. The ideal candidate will be organized, have excellent communication skills, and thrive in a dynamic educational environment.
organisation.safeguardingCommitment: Our staff are committed to providing a safe, inclusive, and supportive environment for our students.

title: Administrator
skillsAndExperience: We are looking for an individual with strong organizational skills, excellent communication abilities, and experience in handling school administrative tasks, including student records, staff coordination, and liaison with parents.
whatSchoolOffers:
- A supportive and collaborative work environment
- Opportunities for career advancement
- A comprehensive benefits package.
safeguardingCommitment: Maplewood High School is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and expects all staff and volunteers to share this commitment.
furtherDetailsAboutTheRole: The role involves working with sensitive information; therefore, a full enhanced DBS check is required.
